name: Call of Duty®: Advanced Warfare - Gold Edition

reviews: "use your shield!" "use a threat grenade!" "activate your drone!" "activate overkill!" shut the hell up please and let me play the goddamn game

Always loved this game, maybe even my favourite.

But this is only worth buying when it's on sale, as continuing to charge $50 for this is absurd.

It's a good looking game don't get me wrong, with decent graphics and a good story, but the game play is definitely on the clunkier side and there's not even an FOV Slider, meaning unless you can put up with the terrible default FOV you're gonna have to tweak the config file, which isn't hard, simply put "seta cg_fov "your desired fov here" "and it'll work, but you're gonna have to do that before you boot the game every time, because it seems to reset after you close it down.

Oh and campaign is really the only sell able thing here, as the multiplayer is completely dead, so unless you can drag friends on to do a private lobby, or you're fine with going against brainless bots (or solo in the case of Zombies), you're not getting much gameplay out of that.

I'd be willing to give this a thumbs up if they lowered the price to someting reasonable and added an FOV slider, but that's never going to happen.
